title: New Summoner Icon Just Black?
body: I recently bought merch from the Riot website and unlocked a free summoner icon. The icon I unlocked is the "rengar plush in the jungle" icon, however once received, it's just black. I tried restarting my client, that didn't fix it. I'm unsure if this is a bug or if it's something I can fix.

replies.body:
Looks like that icon is celebrating black friday a little early xD!

......Okay yea I apologize for that joke....


This is something we know about, and it sounds like the art may not have been uploaded on time. I've been told it should be added correctly either once the patch drops or at least by this Friday!
Thanks for the reminder! Of course, free is free so I don't mind that much as long as I don't have to fix something about my client, so here's hoping! :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
